QuestData.Title: The Altar of Storms
QuestData.Description: Up on the bluffs above our comfy cave is a powerful altar. A powerful DEMONIC altar, guarded by cultists, but powerful nonetheless. If you can reach it, you can use it to bring Loramus back to us.$b$bThe altar will likely resist your efforts, so you'll have to protect Loramus' body while the ritual completes. Bring the demon hunter back to me afterwards.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring Loramus' Body to the Altar of Storms, then protect it while the ritual completes.
QuestData.RewardText: You... you fool! What have you done?
